problem_impact.core_problem_statement: Legacy ERP system causing production delays and manual reporting overhead.
problem_impact.business_impact: 20% slower order-to-delivery cycle; 15 hours/week manual reporting; risk of losing key accounts

current_desired_state.current_state: SAP R/3 on-prem, manual Excel reports, no real-time dashboards
current_desired_state.desired_future_state: Cloud ERP with real-time analytics, automated reporting, mobile access for floor managers

buying_dynamics.stakeholders_power_map: CTO (decision maker), VP Engineering (champion), CFO (budget holder)
buying_dynamics.decision_process_timing: Board approval needed, targeting Q2 decision
buying_dynamics.perceived_risks: Data migration complexity, change management for 200+ users

renessai_fit.how_renessai_solves_top_pains: Proven ERP migration methodology; analytics accelerator for real-time dashboards
renessai_fit.differentiation_vs_status_quo: End-to-end delivery vs. piecemeal vendors; manufacturing domain expertise
renessai_fit.delivery_phasing_idea: Phase 1: Assessment & roadmap (4 weeks), Phase 2: Core migration (12 weeks), Phase 3: Analytics layer (6 weeks)

proof_next_actions.proof_points_to_use: Similar transformation for Nordic Manufacturing Co (30% cycle time reduction)
proof_next_actions.next_steps: Schedule technical deep-dive with CTO; prepare tailored demo environment
